snippet: A prisoner in Uruguay tapped into the American ambassador’s cellphone and tried to commit fraud, the authorities said Tuesday.
abstract: Authorities in Uruguay report that a prison inmate tapped into the cellphone of United States Ambassador Julissa Reynoso and tried to commit fraud.
lead_paragraph: A prisoner in Uruguay tapped into the American ambassador’s cellphone and tried to commit fraud, the authorities said Tuesday.

headline.main: Uruguay: Inmate Tapped Into U.S. Ambassador’s Phone
headline.print_headline: Uruguay: Inmate Tapped Into Ambassador’s Phone
